akn:content.akn:p: A person commits the offense of shoplifting if, with intent to appropriate without complete payment any personal property of another that is offered for sale or with intent to defraud the owner of the value of the property, that person:
Any person convicted of shoplifting shall be fined not more than the amount set forth in ยง 22-3571.01 or imprisoned for not more than 90 days, or both.
It is not an offense to attempt to commit the offense described in this section.
